students.secondaryText: Subscribe to the notifications you want to be updated or be an announcer of a topic.
Get direct updates about jobs from companies almost regularly on College Mate and apply with just a click.
Build an online resume with College Mate and share it with hiring companies.
Stay in touch with alumni of your college and get your questions answered.
Get all your doubts clarified using College Mate's Q&A portal and also by our guest speakers.
